Class ObsStorageImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sensorhub.impl.module.AbstractModule<BasicStorageConfig>
      • org.sensorhub.impl.persistence.perst.BasicStorageImpl
        • org.sensorhub.impl.persistence.perst.ObsStorageImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEventProducer, IModule<BasicStorageConfig>, IBasicStorage, IObsStorage, IObsStorageModule<BasicStorageConfig>, IRecordStorageModule<BasicStorageConfig>, IStorageModule<BasicStorageConfig>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MultiEntityStorageImpl

    public class ObsStorageImpl
extends BasicStorageImpl
implements IObsStorageModule<BasicStorageConfig>

    PERST implementation of IObsStorage for storing observations.

    Since:
    Nov 15, 2015
    Author:
    Alex Robin
